sentences: „Kriips-kraaps, kriips-kraaps!” algab kuivade luuaraagude ebameeldiv laul sillutisel: kojamehed teevad igahommikust tolmavat tualetti.
Tuua on käibele võetud uus tualetti.
context: In Estonian, 'tualetti' is the illative case form of 'tualett', meaning it indicates movement toward or into a toilet/restroom. It's commonly used to refer to going to the bathroom or using the facilities.
